meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erin McGrew Herndon John West Jim Baer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4112.

td.p: Erin McGrew Herndon, an actor and musician from Rockwall, Texas
John West, an attorney from Seattle, Washington
Jim Baer, a project coordinator from Mount Laurel, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,799)

tr.td: THE 1960s
BASKETBALL RULES
"M" MARKS THE SPOT
FASHIONABLE FEMALES
MILITARY PROMOTIONS
FOOD CROSSWORD CLUES

John
Erin

(Alex: Each correct response will be a TV character.)
